org.elasticsearch.plugin.scoring

Class NativeScriptScoringPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.plugins.Plugin
      • org.elasticsearch.plugin.scoring.NativeScriptScoringPlugin

  • public class NativeScriptScoringPlugin
extends org.elasticsearch.plugins.Plugin
    This class is instantiated when Elasticsearch loads the plugin for the first time. If you change the name of this plugin, make sure to update src/main/resources/es-plugin.properties file that points to this class.
